name: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
title: Yoimiya: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
in_play_description: After your Yoimiya, who has this card equipped, triggers Niwabi Enshou: Deal 1 additional Pyro DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Yoimiya to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Yoimiya, equip this card.
After Yoimiya equips this card, immediately use Niwabi Fire-Dance once.
After your Yoimiya, who has this card equipped, triggers Niwabi Enshou: Deal 1 additional Pyro DMG.
(You must have Yoimiya in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
